summary: The document is an agent report from 1958, detailing an investigation into Robert Scheer, a pre-inductee with employment history at the New York Post Office, City College Library, Donnel Library, and Laufers Hotel. It includes personal details, employment records, and notes discrepancies in Social Security Numbers provided by Scheer. The report was submitted on 28 August 1958 and includes information processed under Executive Order 1050.
key_findings: Robert Scheer's employment and personal details were investigated by the 108th CIC Group.
Discrepancies were found in the Social Security Numbers provided by Scheer across different employment records.
The document includes Scheer's education history, employment history, and references.
